item.description: Americans across the country will gather outside congressional offices Feb. 3rd from noon to 7 p.m. to protest NDAA 2012 (H.R. 1540). We have an opportunity to support this nationwide event in opposition to this horrendous bill that further comprimises the law of the land..., aka the Constitution! This is a perfect oppurtunity for ALL citizens to unite since this legislation affects ALL of us. So gather you family, friends, neighbors and coworkers and pick choose a block of time within this 7 hour time frame and make yourselves heard! If you do not live in the Western MA area, find your local Rep's office...LET'S DO THIS!
item.name: Western MA NDAA Congressional Protest
